import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function AnimalById() { const [animal, setAnimal] = useState() useEffect(() => { fetch(`${window.location.pathname}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) => setAnimal(res)) }) if (!animal) return

Loading...

return (

{animal.name}

{animal.name}

Species: {animal.species}

Breed: {animal.breed}

Sex: {animal.sex}

Age: {animal.age}

Location: {animal.location}

Current Owner: {animal.currentOwner.username}

{messageView ? (
{handleSendTo(animal.currentOwner.username)}
) : null}
) } export default AnimalById;
